name: RED NOIR
description:
This t my first project so bear with me if its not perfect. The game is set in a retro environment and draws inspiration from classic Metroidvania games, with an emphasis on exploration, puzzles, and ranged combat.     I've poured my heart and soul into creating this game, and I'm excited to share it with the world. I'm incredibly grateful to all the people who have supported me throughout this journey, from friends and family to fellow game developers and fans.

Without your encouragement, feedback, and constructive criticism, I would have never made it this far. So, from the bottom of my heart, thank you for helping me turn my dream into a reality.

Your feedback its more than welcome (good and bad).
